items.title: Afghan national arrested over alleged bomb threat in Texas: DHS
items.description: Investigators said they arrested an Afghan national on Tuesday who they allege was building a bomb.

items.title: Protesters arrested in NYC over possible ICE-related activity near Chinatown
items.description: Multiple people were arrested Saturday after a large group were protesting possible ICE-related activity near Chinatown.

items.title: Shopping mall shooting wounds 2, prompts Black Friday evacuation in the Bay Area
items.description: Police in California evacuated a shopping mall on one of the busiest shopping days of the year after a shooting left two people with gunshot wounds

items.title: WATCH:  Military funeral in Kyiv for American volunteer fighter
items.description: ABC News’ Ian Pannell is in Kyiv, Ukraine, at the funeral of an American who lost his life fighting against Russia’s invasion.

items.title: LIVE:  ABC News Live
items.description: 24/7 coverage of breaking news and live events
